website_summaries.verdict: Sleek glass design and L-shape for gamers who need a spacious setup.
pros: A large L-shaped desk with quality glass surfaces and a built-in shelf
This is a great choice for a dual-monitor or even three-monitor setup
cons: Stickers are difficult to remove without damaging glass
Fingerprints show up easily on glass

customer_reviews.title: I bought this desk in November 2015. No complaints ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk in November 2015. No complaints until this morning. The glass section on the right return exploded into a million glass pieces. Nothing fell on it.... just spontaneously exploded! Glass went all over my office and my all in one (very expensive) computer hit the floor and busted. This economical desk cost me $1500 so far today... plus I have to purchase a new desk...get carpet cleaned... the list goes on.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass, mangled Box
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Athesticly ok, but keyboard tray sits low and is not adjustable. My chair has to be in the lowest setting in order to be able to use it and not have my knees hit it. Has a good foot print to space ratio. I can put everything i need on it without having it take up too much space. Neg: The box came completely mangled and one of the large panes of glass completely shattered. Not sure if this was a shipping problem or not. Also, parts appeared to have been assembled before. If i was getting a used or refurbished part or parts then I would have expected to have been told and received an appropriate price reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wieger

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great desk
customer_reviews.text: I have had this desk now for over a year and really love how it looks in my office. I don’t have a lot of space and is reason I purchased this one. No issues with breaking, glass seems very strong. The top part holds two 22in monitors with no issues. I did not like the keyboard stand as was too low so I just use the main desk. It does not have a lot of space so if you are looking for a large desk this may not be for you. However if you are looking for a good space saver I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I only stated that this is easy to assemble because I wasn't the one to assemble it 😅. I hired someone online, but he had no complaints and did it in 45m. Its sturdy but from the bottom the glass is pretty easy to lift up so if you have busy body little ones the like to push things, I'd keep them away. The desk does have several weight requirements per piece of glass, but I honestly didnt bother to weigh all of my items and calculate before I put them on there however, it is holding up pretty good. The glass is also easy to clean BUT the desk is extremely heavy, especially in packaging when it was delivered
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fughetta

customer_reviews.title: It's  Perfect and steady
customer_reviews.text: I love my new desk. For the price you can't beat it. It's very sturdy and looks much more expensive than the price. The glass is thick and I enjoy sitting at my desk doing projects and work. The pull out tray also works well for my keyboard and I couldn't ask for a better product for the money. The assembly was done by someone else, because I just didn't want to take the time to figure it all out. It did take him a while to put it together and I believe I paid 75.00 to have it done. Well worth it, so I wouldn't have to struggle with all the parts. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: MSBAW1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home office desk!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased 2 of these desks to update our home office. With the pandemic and working from home our home office needed a bit more desk space so I bought another of the desks. Perfect! the curved section and desk with monitor shelf was just what my husband needed for all of his laptops and monitors and the additional straight desk was perfect for me as a writing station. The desks look great, are sturdy and provide a great deal of desk space at an excellent price! I highly recommend the desk!
customer_reviews.author: L Lawson

customer_reviews.title: I really do like this desk
customer_reviews.text: When the instructions said it would be easier with two people I chuckled and continued on my merry way of putting it together. I SHOULD NOT HAVE LAUGHED. I managed to get it together myself but when securing the two sides together, an extra set of hands would have been so helpful. That said, I really do like this desk. It's sturdy to hold a computer on each side (I work from home and also have a personal PC) and I can swivel back and forth between them. The only downside is the bottom stabilizers (the ones that have the Vs on them) came horribly scraped up.
customer_reviews.author: AlixI

customer_reviews.title: They did a great job. Now I have assembled it I must ...
customer_reviews.text: My previous review of this desk was all about the packaging and shipping. They did a great job. Now I have assembled it I must give it five stars (6 if I could). The directions were excellent,only one tool needed to assemble, an allen wrench - included with the hardware. It took a little over 2 hours to build but turned out to be solid as a rock and there were no extra parts or hardware left over - ladies you know what I mean! Apart from the extra screws that had been included, just in case. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is made with decent quality, thick glass that is sturdy and supports more weight than I'd have expected. The metal frame is pretty standard and of average quality. I put this together by myself, but it's awkward to do alone and has some slight heavy lifting (the glass) so I'd recommend having someone help. The keyboard can only be set up on the one side so consider that when purchasing. You can likely force it to the other side but it's not designed for easy switching.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Even with High Expectations, this Desk Overdelivers . . .
customer_reviews.text: I took my time researching this purchase and, with all the positive reviews this desk had, I was expecting a good product. I didn't quite expect it to be this good, however. The desk is VERY sturdy, well machined, and attractive. It sits at a good height and the pullout keyboard tray really DOES have enough room to put a mouse pad -- not an abundance, but enough to accommodate it properly. Take a look from up close and you can see how stable the black powdercoating is as well. Also, the instructions that came with it were about as clear and logical as any you're going to find. No ESL goof-ups or nonsensical phrases. I'm really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad desk for the price. I just wish the keyboard drawer was a little larger and would come out from the desk a little more. All and all a good desk. Update: I've had this desk for years and the only issue I had is that the keyboard tray wouldn't come out from beyond the desk more than two inches. For some reason, maybe there was a lock or it was stuck this entire time, the keyboard tray came out fully! I bumped my rating up to 5 stars because of this from 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the merchandise was better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews about this item and did not know what to expect when it arrived. I had no problems with this item at all. The packaging was very adequate, there was no breakage or scratching of parts. The quality of the merchandise was better than I expected. The labels came off fine. The parts fit together with no difficulty, the assembly was easy and quick and the sturdiness was better than the negative reviews led me to believe. I highly recommend this item. Great price, great look, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: The Troll Under the Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with the quality for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk for the price - a ton of space, clean lines, pretty solid (assuming you take your time with putting it together), with simple instructions. I use it in a music space - lots of room for keyboards, drum machines, etc. and plenty options to run cables along the cross-bars. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Speachless
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but 1piece of glass is cut crooked. Theres chip in 1 part of paint. Screws were too big for keyboard holder. But the bars going across each side are the exact same length so switch them and you can have your keyboard holder under the monitor stand :) i think poles 5 and 6 or 4 and 5? I was sent to of the same side for 1 side. Customer service helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: This Desk makes you want to sit there all day and work
customer_reviews.text: I have always been the type that prefers to go into the office .... but since I purchased this desk, I enjoy working from home. there is more than enough available room surface to work . its designed for a corner but point the curved intersection towards a window / view and you will wished that you ordered this desk long ago . I wish that I could attach photos to show , so you can see for yourself. The price is great and well worth lt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk for gaming. I use two 24" monitors, which can sit side-by-side, by the way, and use the "shelf" to hold some of my collectables. My XBox 1 sits beneath the shelf perfectly. I love the aesthetics: simple, clean, stylish, and perfectly sized for what I need. In addition, I run my cables along the frame via zip-ties for nice cable management. You'd think with glass that fingerprints would be a huge issue. Well, it does get smudgy some, as glass does, but it's nowhere near as bad as I thought and simple enough to keep clean. It's a great all-around office or gaming desk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elrod

customer_reviews.title: assembly was easy, even without instructions it's durable (I accidentally dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: assembly was easy, even without instructions it's durable (I accidentally dropped a glass panel on a tile floor when moving it) its great has room for a small - medium keyboard and mouse on tray keyboard tray and monitor stand can be assembled on either side Cons: Instructions aren't in english despite there being six different instructions with six different languages keyboard tray is greasy, so when i touch the front, I get grease on my hands box was beat up pieces were scattered throughout the box (screws, etc) 10 overall, its a great desk. Just prepare some (extra) paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble. Hard to move.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, but make sure it's in the place where you want it. If you try to move it after building it, you'll need two people so that it doesn't bend the structure. But overall, it's pretty sturdy once it's in place. It looks nice. I've found it a little bit easy to put little chips in the edge of the glass when I accidentally hit it with my ring. I recommend putting something on to protect the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice, modern desk.
customer_reviews.text: The desk looks really good. It has plenty of table space. I was able to fit two curved 32" monitors side by side and a third ultra wide monitor on the shelf. There's plenty of leg room and the ability to change the shelf and keyboard locations when assembling is really nice. The price and style were just right. This is the perfect desk for working remotely from home during a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: One pet peeve was the stickers on each glass were a real pain to take off.  I tried a razor, but slightly scratched the glass
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews were right, this really is fairly easy to set up. But you still need 2 people, so one person can hold the other side. Also, read the instructions carefully, and don't tighten the bolts until the glass is placed on -- which is the last step. I really like the elegance and simplicity of the design. Also, you can put the keyboard tray and monitor stand on either the right or the left. But you have to decide the layout before you start building. Glass seems sturdy, and monitor stands can support 60 lbs. But the corner piece can only handle 30 lbs, so don't put heavy things in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie White

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't suck, literally.
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic and is easy to put together. It includes a hex driver but you'll have to provide your own phillips just for the keyboard tray. Everything fit together pretty well. That's not to say that there are a few things I wish could be improved though. The suction cups suck, because they don't suck....No it is not an analogy, they don't suck...i mean they do, but they don't. You get the idea. The glass slides really easily and can fall off. Almost had that happen to me on my first day using it. I also wish they had a tinted version of this table. That would've just been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny D

customer_reviews.title: The factory painted over rust, so the paint started ...
customer_reviews.text: The factory painted over rust, so the paint started coming off in huge sheets on one tube. And we can see that half the other parts have the same bumpy paint over rust texture as that tube. Could not get new parts because these desks are no longer in production, they offered a complete return and replacement of the whole desk, but we needed a desk, had already eliminated the old one, and figured we'd probably end up with different rusty parts on the next desk. Also, the people complaining about tiny static fibers and dust in the packaging are correct, it was a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you like rats?
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been waiting for this all day and a big amazon truck pulls up. Super excited so I can start setting up the game and I got a fricken critter cage instead. What the heck!!! This is the dumbest thing ever. I refused to take the item from the delivery guy because yeah I don’t need a five foot rat cage! The guy calls and amazon basically told both of us to eff ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk I work from home and after 7 years decided it was time to replace my desk so glad I did so much room and more sturdy than my last desk . The downside it the keyboard seems a bit lower than I was use to but not a big issue. UPDATE: real disappointed on how easy this glass scratches . I had another fresh fir 7 years and not one scratch this one less than 6 months and looks terrible with the scratches.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkPink71

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled the desk today but so far it seems very sturdy and looks nice! This exactly what I wanted but keep in mind when buying this that it’s harder to hide wires with glass desks. I’ll update my review if anything changes over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Fedele

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble Alone
customer_reviews.text: It's so worth buying! I was afraid it would be too big, but it fits great in my small house and has plenty of work space. It took me about an hour to assemble alone. It was shipped and delivered two days after placing the order so it was basically a week early! Only down side is the keyboard slide out. I skipped the assembly due to the screws not fitting right, i will attempt again but I need more time/ patience with it. It seems like the screws are too big? When I screw the screw into the desk it feels tight. It's not something I need right now so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay H

customer_reviews.title: Go Ahead and Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering this desk because I wasn't sure if it would be enough space or sturdy enough to hold my new HP34 Envy Monitor all in one. Let me say, MORE THAN ENOUGH!!!!! Very pleased with the desk. Simple enough assembly. Package perfect were you can keep all the packaging materials in one big box to dispose of. Took me about an hour to assemble. If I did it again 30min easy. Ohhhh! Remember not to tighten all the bolts until the end. This is a definite, "Go ahead and buy."
customer_reviews.author: Ben Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk - terrible packaging choices.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and pretty once you’re done, but marks off for the packaging and horrible stickers on the glass. It shipped in a cardboard box filled with the cheap foam that leaves white flecks everywhere - and there’s a lot of it. The glass pieces all have stickers on them with the weight limits. That’s no problem, but the stickers have heavy-duty glue that shouldn’t be used on glass - plan to spend a good 20 minutes scrubbing them off.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Patton

customer_reviews.title: I am SO happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this purchase! I will give you the categorical answer to a lot of people's questions on this: YES: you can arrange the desks with the shelf on the left OR the right. YES: you can arrange the desks with the pull-out drawer on the left OR the right OR not installed at all. YES: You can mix and match the shelf and the drawer in any combination. I've even flipped my left-hand surface back-to-front so that I can have a friend pull a chair on the outside of the desk and work from the outside while I sit in the normal position. It's also beautiful and sturdy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: amelocik

customer_reviews.title: All the good reviews are deserved
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking - solid - functional - good value. The main desk and computer desk changability are great. The keyboard tray is large enough for a mouse too. The instructions are clear and user friendly - if followed closely. It is well packed to protect the parts. I suggest you open the package after spreading a sheet under it. This will assist in cleaning up the packing particles - will be a mess if you aren’t careful. From cutting open the package, assembly, cleaning up the mess and boxes, putting the desk in place with everything on it was about 3 hours doing it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer1948

customer_reviews.title: Z-Line Belaire Glass L-Shaped Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have the issues that some have had mentioned here. Very nice desk with lots of room. The fingerprint problem is there, but, only due to the glass. The stickers are not that bad, some goo-b-gone and some Windex takes good care of that. One thing I will mention, once you've gotten it together, press down on the suction cups that are there to hold the glass in place, helps with keeping the panes in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, sturdy, stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these desks. Z-line won my loyalty when my first desk had an issue with the keyboard tray. The sliders broke and the tray came off. It was after 5 years of heavy use. I emailed the company about it and they simply asked for the address to ship it to, no hassle. The new one came and now we have matching workstations in our office and they look so nice. I would recommend this to anyone looking for inexpensive, sturdy, stylish desk space, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it for a while and it has broken yet. The metal parts shift a lot and it's almost impossible to get the screws and bars to line up perfectly straight without loosening some of them. Which then causes the table to become less stable. I*'m pretty sure if the round corner piece wasn't attached the two tables would probably be much sturdier. The glass shifts a lot while your using it. I didn't expect much from it though because it was so cheap and i just need any desk really. Will be upgrading to a nice wooden or plastic desk in the future. But for now this get's the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. My expectations weren't that high based on the price. Arrived with the one of the glass desk panels shattered. Unfortunately, this wasn't discovered until the carton was opened and all the pieces were removed. Called manufacturer and they shipped a replacement. Although, it took about 7 days to receive, this was an easier option that trying to repackage and return to Amazon. Assembly was straight forward. But the keyboard slider is off about a 1/4 inch on side. This appears to be a quality issue. Usable, but annoying. Again, not annoying enough for me to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted (:
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk! It was very easy to put together but I also had help from my sister so I recommend having another person to hold sides and help out during assembly. This desk is much larger and modern looking in person. It's absolutely gorgeous! I never would have found something in my area of this size for such a great price. Because this desk is large and connects together, it is very difficult to move. I would definitely recommend setting up the desk exactly or very close to where you are going to put it. 5/5! (:
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to get this delivered as it is glass. When it arrived the box was pretty banged up, but BOY do they know how to pack the box! Nothing was broken or missing! I set it up the night I got it. It is great for creating the illusion of a larger space while having a full sized corner desk. The only down side is that the glass doesn't completely align, which could have just been my fault in not waiting until the end to fully tighten all of the bolts. It is a 2 person set up though, so make sure you have a helper!
customer_reviews.author: B Cherington

customer_reviews.title: keyboard screws didn’t fit but everything else fine! took an hour
customer_reviews.text: for part f the screws it came with didn’t attach to the keyboard part! because of past reviews I was afraid it would come broken however it did not everything fit until I got to the last step where I had to use the screws given for the keyboard step. the screws did not fit so i have to take a trip to home depot for smaller ones. overall the desk is cute and i did switch the part with the hutch and one without bc i had a window there. took me about an hour to put together with my brother. i love the look of this desk!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: My coworker and I put this together in about an hour. The most frustrating part was that the Styrofoam left all kinds of little fuzzies or something similar to that and it was hard to get them all wiped off. I did not put the keyboard in as I'm using this for work and I only have two laptops, so the legroom issue most people talk about isn't a problem for me. I have my chair at the highest sitting point and I still can cross my legs under the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Z-Line doesn't understand that assymetrical table legs need Left and Right variants
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little annoyed with this purchase. All of the legs I received are left legs, it's pretty easy to tell because they have dimples where the rails are supposed to attach. I contacted Z-Line and requested two right legs, they sent me the same ones again. They don't have separate part numbers for the two, and just can't figure it out. They say they've done their part and I can tell Amazon if I don't like it, so here I am, not liking it. I'm going to keep it though, as apart from that flaw it's a pretty cool desk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks, but rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I was actually shopping for an L shaped desk that I could have two computers set up for two users, but this desk is really only big enough for one. That notwithstanding, it's a solid 5 stars. Ease of assembly, sturdy design and construction, and room for one person is amazing. I would recommend anyone looking for a cheap but solid glass L shaped desk to get this model. The packaging it came in was amazingly secure, no broken glass even though the outer box looked a little dinged. The interior packaging was very well put together. No worries when ordering this one!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Really great desk. When you get it, the glass panes have stickers warning you that it is - you guessed it - made of glass. And warning you that glass can break. They're big stickers and without a lot of isopropyl alcohol, patience, and a tool for peeling it up (I just used a guitar pick), you'll probably be bothered by it. Once you remove the silly stickers, though, this table is pretty nice. It's very roomy, fits most corners nicely, and the little shelf on the left side (orientation can be reversed while constructing) is good for storing other tech like cameras and headphones etc.
customer_reviews.author: iskur

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: It's glass so there are definite weight limits and the corner piece isn't well suported. The bearings are sticking on the keyboard rail. Not bad, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Benton

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, practical, and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This desk is nearly perfect for my purposes. I use it in my music studio. You can assemble the desk with the shelf on either side of the L, and the keyboard drawer can be on the same side as the shelf or on the opposite side. My desk chair is fairly large, and it slides comfortably into the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Spitzig

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Packaging and Came without Screws
customer_reviews.text: The glass and medal legs are all here And fine Thank God! But the packaging was terrible and had a bunch of huge holes in the box. The bag of screws are did not come with it so I can’t put it together :(. So... gotta contact them and stuff and see what happens...
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase that is well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a super easy to put together desk. The instructions were very clear from beginning to end. The only part that gave me a little trouble was the screws for the keyboard tray, but a little more torque fixed that problem. I definitely needed help with putting on the corner connecting piece, but the assistance was only needed for 2-3 minutes; everything else was a one person job. I currently have two 27” monitors on the top glass shelf and did not experience any issues with placement . The tempered glass is supported by a frame consisting of metal pipes that are very sturdy. I’ve already recommended the setup to a few friends!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Howard

customer_reviews.title: Highly reconfigurable desk at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk design. The keyboard tray and monitor stand are swappable so you can choose which side each one is on independent of the other. The fact that this can be assembled in multiple configurations makes it an amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rezalas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking desk
customer_reviews.text: Great looking desk. This desk is being used for a small home office and fits perfectly for what I was looking for. Large enough to fit in a corner, very easy to assemble between two people. Glass is nice and heavy, while the desk is very sturdy. The price point for the desk is perfect, and I can't find anything negative to say about this purchase. If you're looking at this desk, I would pick one up.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great desk for a gaming computer I have my ps4 set up on top of the corner the monitor on the flat side some of my vinyl on the computer stand and my laptop under the monitor stand. Desk is extreamly durable I've seen it hit when someone rages at some of the games we play and it hasn't cracked or broken yet but I am using a extra large mousepad that covers most of the top of the desk in front of my monitor
customer_reviews.author: Pathune

customer_reviews.title: A Product Worth Owning.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, this is a great value. There are a few minor issues I have with the product (glass security/legroom for very tall people), however, they would not deter me from purchasing the product. It doesn't fit flush into a corner as the desk is rounded, but that is an afterthought once you realize the efficiency of the product. It holds my workstations, books, stationery, etc.-so it gets the job done well. Overall, I am very impressed. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Johnson2088

customer_reviews.title: Desk is great. Hope your delivery people aren't dirt bags
customer_reviews.text: Desk is great. I have two of them. Zero stars for shipping/packing. The box came all beat up. Hardware was literally falling out of the box. Multiple scratches on the structure of these desks. Amazon is great, until you order something is somewhat heavy. Then the fine people at fedex/ups/usps ruin it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy desk for good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk for reasonable price. Was easy to put together if you look at the instructions first and use correct screws in correct place. I used an electric driver but a tool is provided, along with a couple of spare parts. It's heavy, but easy to assemble. Looks good and doesn't take to much space. 60" from wall to outer end in both directions fully assembled. 24" Front to Back and 30" from desk glass to floor. I am 6'1" tall, and have plenty of sitting room even with the key board tray slid out. I also put the keyboard tray on the opposite side from the desk image provided online. It works either place.
customer_reviews.author: Calop

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Pay and Pray that the frame fits the glass evenly... Because mine didnt
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. It looks beautiful, was very easy to put together. Took me about 2 hours. came with all the parts and pieces. The ONLY complaint I have is that the frame doesn't fit the glass as it should. which makes the table seem uneven and the suction cups aren't that strong. so the glass is moveable. if the frame was the correct size for the glass and the suction cups were stronger, this would be a perfect product. the size is perfect, the shape, the elegant look. But this was the best affordable computer desk on amazon. I have 3 27'' monitors and a laptop that all fit on this plus speakers, and its not even crowded.
customer_reviews.author: Frank2bad

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Design/Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We've owned 2 of these desks for about 13 months now. The desks are great because you have an option to put the monitor shelf and keyboard tray on either side. We chose to have our 2 desks mirror each other with a TV between them. Both desks have held up quite well over the year, however, my wife's keyboard rails began to separate from their track recently. Even though my desk was just outside the warranty window Z-Line still sent me replacement rails at no charge within a week. I definitely recommend these for a nice versatile corner style desk.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Shattered glass
customer_reviews.text: Glass top exploded. Sitting in the next room I hear a loud boom. Only thing on the glass was a keyboard and phone charger. No problems for 3 years than this surprise.
customer_reviews.author: HellFrozeOver

customer_reviews.title: Considering the good reviews, I went for it
customer_reviews.text: Not ever hearing of the brand Z-Line, I was a bit skeptical if I should purchase this desk or not. Considering the good reviews, I went for it. I believe this to be a pretty good purchase. Pros- 1. Nothing was broke when shipped 2. Assembly was somewhat simple 3. Its very sleek Cons- 1- Mine didn't come with an English manuel 2- The shipping box looked like it was attacked by a pack of rabbid dogs 3- One of the suction cups for the glass panel will not stick to the glass, thus making my desk slightly wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like the desk. Clean, sleek design. It took me only an hour and a half to assemble. I felt the instructions were easy to follow and pretty much self-explanatory. All the parts were labeled, even the screws were labeled with letters to follow. Yes, as another reviewer stated, it is heavy in its box. I carried each piece one-by-one upstairs to the room I wanted it in. There was no way I could've carried that big box by myself- just consider this if you live alone. The only thing that kinda irked me was the warning stickers didn't come off cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be. The user pictures really don't do this desk justice. It's much more spacious than I expected, very sturdy, and pretty tough. It was a breeze to set up too. It took me about 45 minutes doing so while I casually watched TV, by myself. The only down side is that since it's glass it's hard to hide wires. But It is a good desk with lots of room. I see some desks on here for $4-500 a pop and they are just 4 legs and a top. This was very cheap and good quality. Worth the $120 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. It is perfect for my needs. It is heavy as heck, and does take two people to put it together. But it is very nice looking and it feels sturdy. I like that the assembly is simple enough for us to take it apart and change the side that the monitor stand is on. It will take a little bit of work, but it is certainly manageable. I haven't added the keyboard pull-out tray, as the keyboard sits at the perfect height when on top of the desk. I can't think of anything I would change about it. It is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: The assembly was easy and the final product looks great and is extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never been so impressed by the solid construction and design of home-assembly furniture! My roommate and I each got one, built them in an hour and a half, and now have a glorious battlestation for PC gaming. The assembly was easy and the final product looks great and is extremely sturdy. For $165, it's a bargain! Update: I've had this desk for 2 years now, and I just want to warn people that after taking the desk apart and putting it back together several times, the pieces have morphed slightly. The desk still works great, but the glass pieces are slightly crooked. Still a 5-star purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Using as a Beauty Vanity
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vanity to hold all my makeup and jewelry. The problem is, most of these are very small and WAY overpriced. I started looking for a glass L shaped desk to see if I could find something bigger and cheaper. I went through a lot of options on Amazon, but this was the best price of all the ones I saved. It was VERY easy to assemble - it only took me 20 mins! I'm so glad I didn't overpay for a vanity!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for a good
customer_reviews.text: I received the desk and I was concerned on the amount of glass and if there would be any broken pieces. I opened the packages up and everything was very well protected. The included instructions were simple to follow and it came with the required tools to assemble. Overall it took about an hour to assemble and set up, and I could not be more please. Great desk for a good price
customer_reviews.author: J Bray

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much that I'm going to get a second one
customer_reviews.text: Very nice desk. I like it so much that I am going to get another and make a u-shaped desk to fit all of my computers and ham radios. The desk it quite sturdy, doesn't wobble a bit. I have about 50 pounds worth of gear on it, it certainly can hold more weight. The only thing that caught me off guard was that my mouse doesn't work on glass so I either need a mouse pad or a new mouse that works on glass.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This desk feels very solid and looks great. Make sure you have a friend to help you move it when it is delivered because it is super heavy! Pro tip: get some velcro wire wraps to bind your wires to the legs and struts of the desk. If you don't do this you will see your wire jumble right through the glass and it won't look good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Overall good desk. Sturdy and well priced!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these. Took about an hour to put them together. They look super nice and I love having the glass tops and a shelf. We set them up in a U shape next to each other for the wife and I to game together. No issues so far. PS. I wish they'd used a different type of sticker/adhesive for all the warning stickers we had to peel off. They rip and tore when coming off which required a little extra time to soap soak and get the mess off the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Volf

customer_reviews.title: Nice size...
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour to put together...I'm a woman, this is maybe the fifth thing in my life I've put together. Instructions were pretty simple, nothing too complex. Make sure when you read one direction, read bold print around it too so you don't do something wrong. It seems sturdy. I'm excited to put it to use after I get my chair together. It fits in my small dining room, its really a perfect size. I was nervous it would be too small or too big for the work space I need, I'm glad it isn't! 4 stars cause i DO wish it were simpler :)
customer_reviews.author: alyssa aare

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The box is very heavy when arrived but assembling the pieces together was a piece of cake for me. I love everything about it and I know my husband will to when he comes home to see it! Bought this as a gaming station for the hubby. I love the corner where he could place his computer in the center and the pets won't get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Marshall

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: My desk looks like a repacked return, several blemishes, scratches, repacking would be a nightmare, just going to eat it here & caution anyone else from buying a large item like this. Instructions weren't in the box. Amazon told me on the phone to call manufacturer message line to leave message ... freakin lame. It's a few sheets of paper, either include them or get them to me. Hard to believe it's that simple but it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: These metal desks are tricky
customer_reviews.text: I had to tweak this thing for awhile to get it to align correctly for the heavy glass plates. It's a little annoying and I probably would not buy it again. It's pretty easy to take apart, but those pieces of glass are fragile. Just seems like the welding was rushed (thanks China) and slightly off. It is the nature of these Chinese-made glass/metal desks. I have another small one with similar issues but it's alright and was VERY CHEAP ($30). This one was PRETTY EXPENSIVE!!! (>$200) All in all it looks pretty sweet when it's assembled and being used. That doesn't mean I wouldn't like using it for target practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, POOR shipping, damaged product, BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a star off because of the packaging and damage done to the product. This desk is perfect. It was easy to put together, it looks good, and the price was right. I would definitely recommend this desk. However, when my package came, legs were sticking out and I came to find a huge gauge in the top of one of the glass pieces. This all isn't extremely noticeable for the scratches are in areas that are not easy to see. But still kinda bummed my NEW desk looks rather used. All in all a good product, just don't expect it to be in perfect condition!!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: A amazing glass desk, so much space, and not to mention it is beautiful in person! The assembly was so simple, and easy Just make sure to be careful when your handling the glass and the giant box is very heavy so be prepared. I would 100% recommend this glass desk
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Bella

customer_reviews.title: Z-line Belaire L-Shaped Glass Desk
customer_reviews.text: very nice cheap desk and was very easy to set it up only took me 15-20 by my self to assemble. the fit of glass is not perfect but very close the keyboard try is nice and sturdy. i don't know what people are complaining about the desk it's solid and all the sticker's where very easy to remove with a sharp clean razor blade. some people must have gotten a knock off this desk i ordered mine from amazon directly and it arrived in perfect condition. i will update my review in 6 month's to a year after i use the desk more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Castorr

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!  Makes my home office look bigger!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about having a "glass" desk. It looked great but I was afraid of it's sturdiness and keeping it clean. I have to say it's very sturdy. I haven't had to clean it yet (had it over a month) and I see no visible fingerprints or dust. Added benefit: because it's clear, it makes my office seem bigger and more open. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Crislip

customer_reviews.title: slick looking...
customer_reviews.text: this desk actually is very sturdy and can hold alot. Now i'm not taken any chances and the glass break. But this desk is very cool looking and has the room and space for my ps4, 2 monitors, keyboard and mouse and some decor. I recommend this desk for anyone who has kids, teens or older.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk but missing some screws
customer_reviews.text: It fits my two monitors, PC, books, and knicknacks all on top of it. I love the keyboard tray and elevated monitor mount so my cats can lounge on the desk without interfering with my work. The only issue was a couple of screws were missing and then some others weren't quite the right size, so I had to visit the hardware store twice to get some that fit better. It took a few hours to assemble between me and my dad, but that also included the hardware trips. Regardless, I recommend the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Chan Burns

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sleek, easy clean
customer_reviews.text: I've had the desk for about 3 years now. If you're looking for an L desk to match with black or glass it will do perfectly. Glass collects dusk and gets dirty easily, but it also easy to clean. I've had no issues with damage or anything else happening to the glass. While assembly isn't hard, it's very awkward to move once assembled because of the way it is connected. So make sure to assemble it next to where you want it!
customer_reviews.author: ThePatron13

customer_reviews.title: Overall cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I think we got someone else's return. The box was very damaged and some of the pieces were already opened. There are some scuffs in the black portion. Every piece of glass had at least 2 stickers that aren't the easiest to remove. I dont think I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah S.

customer_reviews.title: Short and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Although it appears smaller than I thought it was it is still a robust desk. This can easily be assembled by one person although to be safe one would need a second for the glass. I am overall happy with this product however one thing to consider is that the seller strait up lies about it’s true height. It is closer to 31 in. I rate this product Ok
customer_reviews.author: Connor Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Budget Lots of Time for Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Desk itself isn't all that bad for the price (would rate at about a 2.5 if possible)...a couple of issues though: - Left keyboard slide doesn't fully extend - Stickers on each piece of glass didn't come off cleanly - Large warning sticker on one of the center glass pieces that took 20+ minutes of scrubbing and scraping to detach - Not all of the screws / bolts fit in cleanly I'd just be wary when putting everything together and budget for about an hour or so longer than you think you need to clean up the flaws and sticker residue and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Godshalk

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk. The box was pretty beat up and there was a futile tape job attempted to patch a fist sized hole, but all pieces were in tact and accounted for. The shelf holds 2 27 in monitors with no problem. Just remember to switch the rods for the keyboard tray to the side with the shelf during assembly. The stickers are a pain to remove but a scraper and some solvent made quick work of them. The Styrofoam is paper thin and will fly everywhere and stick to everything. Overall, it's a great desk that provides more than enough room without feeling large in the space.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Awesome layout and legroom. Super study. But came with no glass. Contacted seller, got no reply. Waited too long and had to re-home it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable workspace desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk was simple to assemble, the only suggestion I would make is the suction cups for the glass needs to be changed, it does not hold the glass in place securely and the table top slides. Quick fix is a simple arts and crafts clay to secure the glass or the sticky dots will work too. With the capacity to use all four of my work monitors this is spot on for work space are without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: M McCarty

customer_reviews.title: but the desk is perfect, and bigger than I would expect
customer_reviews.text: You couldn't expect more for the price. The assemble took a while, but the desk is perfect, and bigger than I would expect. The glass is thick, clear, the edge is well polished, frames is strong, durable, some friends of mine who have visited my place even asked me for the purchase link. This is would be a perfect computer desk that holds everything and easy to clean. 5 STARS recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great,solid & easy assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: A great looking, eye popping desk that is solid as a rock. I followed the directions to the "T" & it came out perfect. Everyone asks where I got it & asks did I have any damage from shipping? Truth be told: No damage from shipping, directions were flawless & I know that I had any problems at all - Amazon would take care of it. I built it alone in about 1.5 hours & recommend to anyone in need of this item. Thanks again Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something more modern and this was the best looking for the best price. We are not disappointed. The only complaint was that the screws didn't line up completely on the slider part for the keyboard so we had to use a serious drill and some muscle but we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Gammill

customer_reviews.title: Minor inconveniences but overall a great desk!
customer_reviews.text: All in all a good desk, however I have a few complaints: •The glass does not stay in place and slides back and forth all the time. •The desk in uneven, even after adjusting the feet at the bottom •The keyboard tray does not lock when it's pulled out I would however, recommend this desk to anyone who needs the space as these minor inconveniences do not make it a product to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brand

customer_reviews.title: Bad craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly having to readjust the legs and position of the desk. Some parts don't line up as bad as a 1/4" or worse. The bearings and connection for the keyboard slide-out are completely gone, and it's just kind of sitting in there. Also, the ends of the keyboard slide-out are razor sharp, and the little rubber pieces that keep you from cutting yourself on it keep popping off. This could have been made a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Harpers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Rearrange - only wish the top tier was a little lower.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assembled. We got two. The second one only took us 10 minutes. Also, if you look in the picture, the keyboard is below the second desk, but you can easily swap it and have all three tiers be on one side. I did that easily for one of the table sets. You can also opt to not put in the middle part but we did both times. The only con is that the top one for the monitor is about half too high. I wish it was half as tall as it is for perfect user height. But otherwise, it works great as a standing desk monitor.
customer_reviews.author: ktam8

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: This desk was surprisingly nice. It is well packaged and arrived without damage. It can be assembled by one person, but it helps if you have someone to help you balance the pieces while you bolt it together. I do recommend applying very slight moisture to the suction cups before placing the glass. They won't stick otherwise. Fully assembled and properly tightened, a very solid desk. Unfortunately, the keyboard tray slides didn't last long. Keyboard try is constantly coming loose and falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Quaxo

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for. I also got some rgb lights and put those on the back side. Gave my gaming setup a little life. Not to mention i can now pwn on Runescape.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Its really big!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is gorgeous but really big! You can customize the way this desk looks which is a plus in my book :). Assembly was pretty easy but id suggest you have another person to help you.
customer_reviews.author: EEMY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with LED strip lighting!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk for my son's computers. It looks awesome if you add LED strip lighting to it. We already had one and just bought another one to make a big u-shaped station for two people.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality assurance missed something on my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty self explanatory, wasn't to difficult. I had all the pieces that I needed. I love how one could interchange the shelf from side to side. I love how it looks, but the corners/black border on the glass panels were flaked off/damaged. Probably happened in production. Wish I had one of these desks in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kakes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Awesome Desk - Assembly can be challenging
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shape of the desk and the extra shelf. Putting it together was not very hard - my blind boyfriend helped assemble 90% of it. The only issue we had was the keyboard shelf - the screws did not want to go in all the way. Weeks later, I'm still trying to get the screws into the keyboard tray to finish assembly - 2 down, 2 more to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk when we moved and my old desk, very old, did not make the move well. The boxes it comes in are very heavy so beware of that. The instructions are very clear and the end result is a very handsome desk. You can put the monitor stand and the pull out keyboard on either side. I have enough room for two laptops and still have one side for paperwork, notebooks, coffee cups, two telephones, etc. This is a very nice desk.
customer_reviews.author: William Cook

customer_reviews.title: This desk is absolutely awesome I actually threw a tarp down on the ground ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is absolutely awesome I actually threw a tarp down on the ground outside and spray painted the frame *once I put it together, ((a very light matte grey color - to match my tile floors)) I drug it inside and then put the glass on it once in place . It's awesome it's comfortable it's beautiful the light shines through the glass and illuminates your house! Remember if you don't like the color you can always spray paint it hahahaha I would take a picture of the awesomeness, but I'm too lazy hahahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in my home office
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Love the look and fits well in my office. Appears to be very sturdy. My only issue is the area for the keypad doesn’t slide out far enough but can work with this. Still a great buy. Certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie pitts

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice desk, however it is really big and really heavy! Glad we decided on glass. We have had laminate desks in the past which do not stand up to any sort of moisture, i.e. water bottle or cup of coffee. Cannot leave feedback on assembly as I had someone come to put it together, but it only took him about an hour to complete. All in all, husband is thrilled that he now has a "big boy" desk.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: The design of the the desk and fit for what I need is great, however the quality and/or packaging is lacking. Unfortunately the keyboard tray was shattered and top monitor tray was chipped upon arrival. Since the glass portion of the assembly is last, I wish I had checked this before assembly. (REVISED) Amazon customer service was not helpful, however I contacted Z-Line direct and they are sending me replacement parts free of charge. Z-Line service was helpful and professional.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baggetta

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful desk and it's very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful desk and it's very easy to put together. The package was left in my driveway because it is extremely heavy due to the glass slabs. Ladies, you will need your man to help you carry this or you will need to piece it out of the box. It is also very large... So make sure you plan ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble (make sure you read carefully and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (make sure you read carefully and not fulled tightened the screws until the end) and looks great. I took off a star because the screw holes for the keyboard tray seem to have an issue and it's impossible for me to get ANY of those in more than just a tiny bit. Luckily, I never planned on using that part of the desk to begin with or it would have been a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bruno

product_meta.title: Z-Line Belaire Glass L-Shaped Computer Desk
product_meta.description: Color:Clear Glass| Style:Belaire L DeskBelaire glass L desk.
feature_bullets: Sleek L-Shaped Glass Desk From Z-Line Designs; Ideal For Corner Placement
Sturdy Metal Frame With Reinforced Plates On Welding Joints; Black Powder Coat Finish
Clear 6Mm/5Mm Tempered Glass On Desktop, Display Shelf, And Slide-Out Keyboard Tray; Made In China
Measures 60 Inches Wide By 24 Inches Deep By 37 Inches High; Limited Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,641 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
